globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://api.talekeeper.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.talekeeper.org https://accounts.google.com; font-src 'self' data:;
